steps.1: Add-Add 1/4 tsp mustard to the pan
steps.3: Add-1/2 tsp cumin seeds to the pan
steps.4: Add-Add tomato puree to the pan
steps.5: Take-Take the pan off the heat
steps.6: Mix-Mix well tomato puree with contents in the pan
steps.8: Add-1/2 tsp salt to the pan
steps.9: Add-Add 2 tbsp red chili powder to the pan
steps.12: puree-puree tomatoes without any water in a blender/mixer
steps.14: add-When mustard and cumin seeds begin to sizzle, add minced garlic
steps.15: simmer-Allow the mixture to simmer over low heat for 5 minutes or until the mixture becomes thick
steps.16: Heat-Heat 3 tbsp oil in a pan over medium heat
steps.17: Chop-Chop tomato roughly (anysize chunks are fine)
steps.18: Transfer-Transfer it to a serving bowl
steps.19: mix-mix well contents of the pan
